item.title: iOS Localization Tool
item.author: contact@rogermolas.com (Roger Molas)
item.description: Localization is simply the process of translating your app into multiple languages. In situation like you need support multiple language, including API response messages and dynamic strings you need a list of localizable .strings file, and you need to localized it based on the Language you want ( e.g English, Chinese, Japanese ). Xcode has a built-in localizable file generator that generate your localizable .strings for each language you supported.
